block.p: ATLANTIC TECHNOLOGY VENTURES, New York, named Frederic P. Zotos president, succeeding A. Joseph Rudick Jr., who becomes chief executive. Mr. Zotos most recently had been a director for due diligence at Licent Capital.
CONCRETE MEDIA, New York, named Steve Hoffman president, succeeding Aaron Cohen, who remains chief executive. Mr. Hoffman had been managing director at Exchange Partners, Boston.

ATLANTIC TECHNOLOGY VENTURES, New York, named Frederic P. Zotos president, succeeding A. Joseph Rudick Jr., who becomes chief executive. Mr. Zotos most recently had been a director for due diligence at Licent Capital.
CONCRETE MEDIA, New York, named Steve Hoffman president, succeeding Aaron Cohen, who remains chief executive. Mr. Hoffman had been managing director at Exchange Partners, Boston.
INGERSOLL-RAND CO., Woodcliff Lake, N.J., named Herbert L. Henkel, president and chief executive, to the additional post of chairman. He succeeds James E. Perrella, who retired.
SLOCAN FOREST PRODUCTS, Vancouver, British Columbia, named Jim Shepherd, president, to the post of chief executive. He succeeds Ike Barber, who remains chairman.
